author: Aaron Jones
description:
In my last article I wrote of the importance of originality and passion when crafting a story in any medium. Media companies get a taste of success and end up rushing out copycats, sequels, prequels, and more without thinking too much about why the first effort was a success and what truly made it connect […]

The post Originality and the Importance of Passion in Storytelling appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: Originality and the Importance of Passion in Storytelling
